00045 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>

00050 void lstcon_rpc_stat_reply(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *, srpc_msg_t *,
00051                            lstcon_node_t *, lstcon_trans_stat_t *);
00052 
00053 static void
00054 lstcon_rpc_done(srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
00055 {
00056         lstcon_rpc_t *crpc = (lstcon_rpc_t *)rpc->crpc_priv;
00057 
00058         LASSERT(crpc != NULL && rpc == crpc->crp_rpc);
00059         LASSERT(crpc->crp_posted && !crpc->crp_finished);
00060 
00061         spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00062 
00063         if (crpc->crp_trans == NULL) {
00064                 /* Orphan RPC is not in any transaction,
00065                  * I'm just a poor body and nobody loves me */
00066                 spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00067 
00068                 /* release it */
00069                 lstcon_rpc_put(crpc);
00070                 return;
00071         }
00072 
00073         /* not an orphan RPC */
00074         crpc->crp_finished = 1;
00075 
00076         if (crpc->crp_stamp == 0) {
00077                 /* not aborted */
00078                 LASSERT (crpc->crp_status == 0);
00079 
00080                 crpc->crp_stamp  = cfs_time_current();
00081                 crpc->crp_status = rpc->crpc_status;
00082         }
00083 
00084         /* wakeup (transaction)thread if I'm the last RPC in the transaction */
00085         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&crpc->crp_trans->tas_remaining))
00086                 wake_up(&crpc->crp_trans->tas_waitq);
00087 
00088         spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00089 }
00090 
00091 static int
00092 lstcon_rpc_init(lstcon_node_t *nd, int service, unsigned feats,
00093                 int bulk_npg, int bulk_len, int embedded, lstcon_rpc_t *crpc)
00094 {
00095         crpc->crp_rpc = sfw_create_rpc(nd->nd_id, service,
00096                                        feats, bulk_npg, bulk_len,
00097                                        lstcon_rpc_done, (void *)crpc);
00098         if (crpc->crp_rpc == NULL)
00099                 return -ENOMEM;
00100 
00101         crpc->crp_trans    = NULL;
00102         crpc->crp_node     = nd;
00103         crpc->crp_posted   = 0;
00104         crpc->crp_finished = 0;
00105         crpc->crp_unpacked = 0;
00106         crpc->crp_status   = 0;
00107         crpc->crp_stamp    = 0;
00108         crpc->crp_embedded = embedded;
00109         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&crpc->crp_link);
00110 
00111         atomic_inc(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter);
00112 
00113         return 0;
00114 }
00115 
00116 static int
00117 lstcon_rpc_prep(lstcon_node_t *nd, int service, unsigned feats,
00118                 int bulk_npg, int bulk_len, lstcon_rpc_t **crpcpp)
00119 {
00120         lstcon_rpc_t  *crpc = NULL;
00121         int            rc;
00122 
00123         spin_lock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00124 
00125         if (!list_empty(&console_session.ses_rpc_freelist)) {
00126                 crpc = list_entry(console_session.ses_rpc_freelist.next,
00127                                   lstcon_rpc_t, crp_link);
00128                 list_del_init(&crpc->crp_link);
00129         }
00130 
00131         spin_unlock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00132 
00133         if (crpc == NULL) {
00134                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(crpc, sizeof(*crpc));
00135                 if (crpc == NULL)
00136                         return -ENOMEM;
00137         }
00138 
00139         rc = lstcon_rpc_init(nd, service, feats, bulk_npg, bulk_len, 0, crpc);
00140         if (rc == 0) {
00141                 *crpcpp = crpc;
00142                 return 0;
00143         }
00144 
00145         LIBCFS_FREE(crpc, sizeof(*crpc));
00146 
00147         return rc;
00148 }
00149 
00150 void
00151 lstcon_rpc_put(lstcon_rpc_t *crpc)
00152 {
00153         srpc_bulk_t *bulk = &crpc->crp_rpc->crpc_bulk;
00154         int          i;
00155 
00156         LASSERT(list_empty(&crpc->crp_link));
00157 
00158         for (i = 0; i < bulk->bk_niov; i++) {
00159                 if (bulk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page == NULL)
00160                         continue;
00161 
00162                 __free_page(bulk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page);
00163         }
00164 
00165         srpc_client_rpc_decref(crpc->crp_rpc);
00166 
00167         if (crpc->crp_embedded) {
00168                 /* embedded RPC, don't recycle it */
00169                 memset(crpc, 0, sizeof(*crpc));
00170                 crpc->crp_embedded = 1;
00171 
00172         } else {
00173                 spin_lock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00174 
00175                 list_add(&crpc->crp_link,
00176                          &console_session.ses_rpc_freelist);
00177 
00178                 spin_unlock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00179         }
00180 
00181         /* RPC is not alive now */
00182         atomic_dec(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter);
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void
00186 lstcon_rpc_post(lstcon_rpc_t *crpc)
00187 {
00188         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans = crpc->crp_trans;
00189 
00190         LASSERT (trans != NULL);
00191 
00192         atomic_inc(&trans->tas_remaining);
00193         crpc->crp_posted = 1;
00194 
00195         sfw_post_rpc(crpc->crp_rpc);
00196 }
00197 
00198 static char *
00199 lstcon_rpc_trans_name(int transop)
00200 {
00201         if (transop == LST_TRANS_SESNEW)
00202                 return "SESNEW";
00203 
00204         if (transop == LST_TRANS_SESEND)
00205                 return "SESEND";
00206 
00207         if (transop == LST_TRANS_SESQRY)
00208                 return "SESQRY";
00209 
00210         if (transop == LST_TRANS_SESPING)
00211                 return "SESPING";
00212 
00213         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD)
00214                 return "TSBCLIADD";
00215 
00216         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD)
00217                 return "TSBSRVADD";
00218 
00219         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBRUN)
00220                 return "TSBRUN";
00221 
00222         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP)
00223                 return "TSBSTOP";
00224 
00225         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY)
00226                 return "TSBCLIQRY";
00227 
00228         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY)
00229                 return "TSBSRVQRY";
00230 
00231         if (transop == LST_TRANS_STATQRY)
00232                 return "STATQRY";
00233 
00234         return "Unknown";
00235 }
00236 
00237 int
00238 lstcon_rpc_trans_prep(struct list_head *translist, int transop,
00239                       lstcon_rpc_trans_t **transpp)
00240 {
00241         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
00242 
00243         if (translist != NULL) {
00244                 list_for_each_entry(trans, translist, tas_link) {
00245                         /* Can't enqueue two private transaction on
00246                          * the same object */
00247                         if ((trans->tas_opc & transop) == LST_TRANS_PRIVATE)
00248                                 return -EPERM;
00249                 }
00250         }
00251 
00252         /* create a trans group */
00253         LIBCFS_ALLOC(trans, sizeof(*trans));
00254         if (trans == NULL)
00255                 return -ENOMEM;
00256 
00257         trans->tas_opc = transop;
00258 
00259         if (translist == NULL)
00260                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&trans->tas_olink);
00261         else
00262                 list_add_tail(&trans->tas_olink, translist);
00263 
00264         list_add_tail(&trans->tas_link, &console_session.ses_trans_list);
00265 
00266         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&trans->tas_rpcs_list);
00267         atomic_set(&trans->tas_remaining, 0);
00268         init_waitqueue_head(&trans->tas_waitq);
00269 
00270         spin_lock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00271         trans->tas_features = console_session.ses_features;
00272         spin_unlock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00273 
00274         *transpp = trans;
00275         return 0;
00276 }
00277 
00278 void
00279 lstcon_rpc_trans_addreq(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, lstcon_rpc_t *crpc)
00280 {
00281         list_add_tail(&crpc->crp_link, &trans->tas_rpcs_list);
00282         crpc->crp_trans = trans;
00283 }
00284 
00285 void
00286 lstcon_rpc_trans_abort(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, int error)
00287 {
00288         srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc;
00289         lstcon_rpc_t      *crpc;
00290         lstcon_node_t     *nd;
00291 
00292         list_for_each_entry(crpc, &trans->tas_rpcs_list, crp_link) {
00293                 rpc = crpc->crp_rpc;
00294 
00295                 spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00296 
00297                 if (!crpc->crp_posted || /* not posted */
00298                     crpc->crp_stamp != 0) { /* rpc done or aborted already */
00299                         if (crpc->crp_stamp == 0) {
00300                                 crpc->crp_stamp = cfs_time_current();
00301                                 crpc->crp_status = -EINTR;
00302                         }
00303                         spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00304                         continue;
00305                 }
00306 
00307                 crpc->crp_stamp  = cfs_time_current();
00308                 crpc->crp_status = error;
00309 
00310                 spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00311 
00312                 sfw_abort_rpc(rpc);
00313 
00314                 if (error != -ETIMEDOUT)
00315                         continue;
00316 
00317                 nd = crpc->crp_node;
00318                 if (cfs_time_after(nd->nd_stamp, crpc->crp_stamp))
00319                         continue;
00320 
00321                 nd->nd_stamp = crpc->crp_stamp;
00322                 nd->nd_state = LST_NODE_DOWN;
00323         }
00324 }
00325 
00326 static int
00327 lstcon_rpc_trans_check(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans)
00328 {
00329         if (console_session.ses_shutdown &&
00330             !list_empty(&trans->tas_olink)) /* Not an end session RPC */
00331                 return 1;
00332 
00333         return (atomic_read(&trans->tas_remaining) == 0) ? 1: 0;
00334 }
00335 
00336 int
00337 lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, int timeout)
00338 {
00339         lstcon_rpc_t  *crpc;
00340         int            rc;
00341 
00342         if (list_empty(&trans->tas_rpcs_list))
00343                 return 0;
00344 
00345         if (timeout < LST_TRANS_MIN_TIMEOUT)
00346                 timeout = LST_TRANS_MIN_TIMEOUT;
00347 
00348         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Transaction %s started\n",
00349         lstcon_rpc_trans_name(trans->tas_opc));
00350 
00351         /* post all requests */
00352         list_for_each_entry(crpc, &trans->tas_rpcs_list, crp_link) {
00353                 LASSERT(!crpc->crp_posted);
00354 
00355                 lstcon_rpc_post(crpc);
00356         }
00357 
00358         mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
00359 
00360         rc = wait_event_interruptible_timeout(trans->tas_waitq,
00361                                               lstcon_rpc_trans_check(trans),
00362                                               cfs_time_seconds(timeout));
00363 
00364         rc = (rc > 0)? 0: ((rc < 0)? -EINTR: -ETIMEDOUT);
00365 
00366         mutex_lock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
00367 
00368         if (console_session.ses_shutdown)
00369                 rc = -ESHUTDOWN;
00370 
00371         if (rc != 0 || atomic_read(&trans->tas_remaining) != 0) {
00372                 /* treat short timeout as canceled */
00373                 if (rc == -ETIMEDOUT && timeout < LST_TRANS_MIN_TIMEOUT * 2)
00374                         rc = -EINTR;
00375 
00376                 lstcon_rpc_trans_abort(trans, rc);
00377         }
00378 
00379         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Transaction %s stopped: %d\n",
00380                lstcon_rpc_trans_name(trans->tas_opc), rc);
00381 
00382         lstcon_rpc_trans_stat(trans, lstcon_trans_stat());
00383 
00384         return rc;
00385 }
00386 
00387 static int
00388 lstcon_rpc_get_reply(lstcon_rpc_t *crpc, srpc_msg_t **msgpp)
00389 {
00390         lstcon_node_t        *nd  = crpc->crp_node;
00391         srpc_client_rpc_t    *rpc = crpc->crp_rpc;
00392         srpc_generic_reply_t *rep;
00393 
00394         LASSERT (nd != NULL && rpc != NULL);
00395         LASSERT (crpc->crp_stamp != 0);
00396 
00397         if (crpc->crp_status != 0) {
00398                 *msgpp = NULL;
00399                 return crpc->crp_status;
00400         }
00401 
00402         *msgpp = &rpc->crpc_replymsg;
00403         if (!crpc->crp_unpacked) {
00404                 sfw_unpack_message(*msgpp);
00405                 crpc->crp_unpacked = 1;
00406         }
00407 
00408         if (cfs_time_after(nd->nd_stamp, crpc->crp_stamp))
00409                 return 0;
00410 
00411         nd->nd_stamp = crpc->crp_stamp;
00412         rep = &(*msgpp)->msg_body.reply;
00413 
00414         if (rep->sid.ses_nid == LNET_NID_ANY)
00415                 nd->nd_state = LST_NODE_UNKNOWN;
00416         else if (lstcon_session_match(rep->sid))
00417                 nd->nd_state = LST_NODE_ACTIVE;
00418         else
00419                 nd->nd_state = LST_NODE_BUSY;
00420 
00421         return 0;
00422 }
00423 
00424 void
00425 lstcon_rpc_trans_stat(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat)
00426 {
00427         lstcon_rpc_t    *crpc;
00428         srpc_msg_t      *rep;
00429         int              error;
00430 
00431         LASSERT(stat != NULL);
00432 
00433         memset(stat, 0, sizeof(*stat));
00434 
00435         list_for_each_entry(crpc, &trans->tas_rpcs_list, crp_link) {
00436                 lstcon_rpc_stat_total(stat, 1);
00437 
00438                 LASSERT(crpc->crp_stamp != 0);
00439 
00440                 error = lstcon_rpc_get_reply(crpc, &rep);
00441                 if (error != 0) {
00442                         lstcon_rpc_stat_failure(stat, 1);
00443                         if (stat->trs_rpc_errno == 0)
00444                                 stat->trs_rpc_errno = -error;
00445 
00446                         continue;
00447                 }
00448 
00449                 lstcon_rpc_stat_success(stat, 1);
00450 
00451                 lstcon_rpc_stat_reply(trans, rep, crpc->crp_node, stat);
00452         }
00453 
00454         if (trans->tas_opc == LST_TRANS_SESNEW && stat->trs_fwk_errno == 0) {
00455                 stat->trs_fwk_errno =
00456                       lstcon_session_feats_check(trans->tas_features);
00457         }
00458 
00459         CDEBUG(D_NET, "transaction %s : success %d, failure %d, total %d, "
00460                       "RPC error(%d), Framework error(%d)\n",
00461                lstcon_rpc_trans_name(trans->tas_opc),
00462                lstcon_rpc_stat_success(stat, 0),
00463                lstcon_rpc_stat_failure(stat, 0),
00464                lstcon_rpc_stat_total(stat, 0),
00465                stat->trs_rpc_errno, stat->trs_fwk_errno);
00466 
00467         return;
00468 }
00469 
00470 int
00471 lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans,
00472                              struct list_head __user *head_up,
00473                              lstcon_rpc_readent_func_t readent)
00474 {
00475         struct list_head      tmp;
00476         struct list_head     __user *next;
00477         lstcon_rpc_ent_t     *ent;
00478         srpc_generic_reply_t *rep;
00479         lstcon_rpc_t         *crpc;
00480         srpc_msg_t           *msg;
00481         lstcon_node_t        *nd;
00482         cfs_duration_t        dur;
00483         struct timeval        tv;
00484         int                   error;
00485 
00486         LASSERT(head_up != NULL);
00487 
00488         next = head_up;
00489 
00490         list_for_each_entry(crpc, &trans->tas_rpcs_list, crp_link) {
00491                 if (copy_from_user(&tmp, next,
00492                                    sizeof(struct list_head)))
00493                         return -EFAULT;
00494 
00495                 if (tmp.next == head_up)
00496                         return 0;
00497 
00498                 next = tmp.next;
00499 
00500                 ent = list_entry(next, lstcon_rpc_ent_t, rpe_link);
00501 
00502                 LASSERT(crpc->crp_stamp != 0);
00503 
00504                 error = lstcon_rpc_get_reply(crpc, &msg);
00505 
00506                 nd = crpc->crp_node;
00507 
00508                 dur = (cfs_duration_t)cfs_time_sub(crpc->crp_stamp,
00509                       (cfs_time_t)console_session.ses_id.ses_stamp);
00510                 cfs_duration_usec(dur, &tv);
00511 
00512                 if (copy_to_user(&ent->rpe_peer,
00513                                  &nd->nd_id, sizeof(lnet_process_id_t)) ||
00514                     copy_to_user(&ent->rpe_stamp, &tv, sizeof(tv)) ||
00515                     copy_to_user(&ent->rpe_state,
00516                                  &nd->nd_state, sizeof(nd->nd_state)) ||
00517                     copy_to_user(&ent->rpe_rpc_errno, &error,
00518                                      sizeof(error)))
00519                         return -EFAULT;
00520 
00521                 if (error != 0)
00522                         continue;
00523 
00524                 /* RPC is done */
00525                 rep = (srpc_generic_reply_t *)&msg->msg_body.reply;
00526 
00527                 if (copy_to_user(&ent->rpe_sid,
00528                                  &rep->sid, sizeof(lst_sid_t)) ||
00529                     copy_to_user(&ent->rpe_fwk_errno,
00530                                  &rep->status, sizeof(rep->status)))
00531                         return -EFAULT;
00532 
00533                 if (readent == NULL)
00534                         continue;
00535 
00536                 error = readent(trans->tas_opc, msg, ent);
00537                 if (error != 0)
00538                         return error;
00539         }
00540 
00541         return 0;
00542 }
00543 
00544 void
00545 lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans)
00546 {
00547         srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc;
00548         lstcon_rpc_t      *crpc;
00549         lstcon_rpc_t      *tmp;
00550         int                count = 0;
00551 
00552         list_for_each_entry_safe(crpc, tmp, &trans->tas_rpcs_list, crp_link) {
00553                 rpc = crpc->crp_rpc;
00554 
00555                 spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00556 
00557                 /* free it if not posted or finished already */
00558                 if (!crpc->crp_posted || crpc->crp_finished) {
00559                         spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00560 
00561                         list_del_init(&crpc->crp_link);
00562                         lstcon_rpc_put(crpc);
00563 
00564                         continue;
00565                 }
00566 
00567                 /* rpcs can be still not callbacked (even LNetMDUnlink is
00568                  * called) because huge timeout for inaccessible network,
00569                  * don't make user wait for them, just abandon them, they
00570                  * will be recycled in callback */
00571 
00572                 LASSERT(crpc->crp_status != 0);
00573 
00574                 crpc->crp_node  = NULL;
00575                 crpc->crp_trans = NULL;
00576                 list_del_init(&crpc->crp_link);
00577                 count++;
00578 
00579                 spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
00580 
00581                 atomic_dec(&trans->tas_remaining);
00582         }
00583 
00584         LASSERT(atomic_read(&trans->tas_remaining) == 0);
00585 
00586         list_del(&trans->tas_link);
00587         if (!list_empty(&trans->tas_olink))
00588                 list_del(&trans->tas_olink);
00589 
00590         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Transaction %s destroyed with %d pending RPCs\n",
00591                lstcon_rpc_trans_name(trans->tas_opc), count);
00592 
00593         LIBCFS_FREE(trans, sizeof(*trans));
00594 
00595         return;
00596 }
00597 
00598 int
00599 lstcon_sesrpc_prep(lstcon_node_t *nd, int transop,
00600                    unsigned feats, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc)
00601 {
00602         srpc_mksn_reqst_t *msrq;
00603         srpc_rmsn_reqst_t *rsrq;
00604         int                rc;
00605 
00606         switch (transop) {
00607         case LST_TRANS_SESNEW:
00608                 rc = lstcon_rpc_prep(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_MAKE_SESSION,
00609                                      feats, 0, 0, crpc);
00610                 if (rc != 0)
00611                         return rc;
00612 
00613                 msrq = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.mksn_reqst;
00614                 msrq->mksn_sid     = console_session.ses_id;
00615                 msrq->mksn_force   = console_session.ses_force;
00616                 strlcpy(msrq->mksn_name, console_session.ses_name,
00617                         sizeof(msrq->mksn_name));
00618                 break;
00619 
00620         case LST_TRANS_SESEND:
00621                 rc = lstcon_rpc_prep(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_REMOVE_SESSION,
00622                                      feats, 0, 0, crpc);
00623                 if (rc != 0)
00624                         return rc;
00625 
00626                 rsrq = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.rmsn_reqst;
00627                 rsrq->rmsn_sid = console_session.ses_id;
00628                 break;
00629 
00630         default:
00631                 LBUG();
00632         }
00633 
00634         return 0;
00635 }
00636 
00637 int
00638 lstcon_dbgrpc_prep(lstcon_node_t *nd, unsigned feats, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc)
00639 {
00640         srpc_debug_reqst_t *drq;
00641         int                 rc;
00642 
00643         rc = lstcon_rpc_prep(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_DEBUG, feats, 0, 0, crpc);
00644         if (rc != 0)
00645                 return rc;
00646 
00647         drq = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.dbg_reqst;
00648 
00649         drq->dbg_sid   = console_session.ses_id;
00650         drq->dbg_flags = 0;
00651 
00652         return rc;
00653 }
00654 
00655 int
00656 lstcon_batrpc_prep(lstcon_node_t *nd, int transop, unsigned feats,
00657                    lstcon_tsb_hdr_t *tsb, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc)
00658 {
00659         lstcon_batch_t     *batch;
00660         srpc_batch_reqst_t *brq;
00661         int                 rc;
00662 
00663         rc = lstcon_rpc_prep(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_BATCH, feats, 0, 0, crpc);
00664         if (rc != 0)
00665                 return rc;
00666 
00667         brq = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.bat_reqst;
00668 
00669         brq->bar_sid     = console_session.ses_id;
00670         brq->bar_bid     = tsb->tsb_id;
00671         brq->bar_testidx = tsb->tsb_index;
00672         brq->bar_opc     = transop == LST_TRANS_TSBRUN ? SRPC_BATCH_OPC_RUN :
00673                            (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP ? SRPC_BATCH_OPC_STOP:
00674                             SRPC_BATCH_OPC_QUERY);
00675 
00676         if (transop != LST_TRANS_TSBRUN &&
00677             transop != LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP)
00678                 return 0;
00679 
00680         LASSERT (tsb->tsb_index == 0);
00681 
00682         batch = (lstcon_batch_t *)tsb;
00683         brq->bar_arg = batch->bat_arg;
00684 
00685         return 0;
00686 }
00687 
00688 int
00689 lstcon_statrpc_prep(lstcon_node_t *nd, unsigned feats, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc)
00690 {
00691         srpc_stat_reqst_t *srq;
00692         int                rc;
00693 
00694         rc = lstcon_rpc_prep(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_QUERY_STAT, feats, 0, 0, crpc);
00695         if (rc != 0)
00696                 return rc;
00697 
00698         srq = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.stat_reqst;
00699 
00700         srq->str_sid  = console_session.ses_id;
00701         srq->str_type = 0; /* XXX remove it */
00702 
00703         return 0;
00704 }
00705 
00706 static lnet_process_id_packed_t *
00707 lstcon_next_id(int idx, int nkiov, lnet_kiov_t *kiov)
00708 {
00709         lnet_process_id_packed_t *pid;
00710         int                       i;
00711 
00712         i = idx / SFW_ID_PER_PAGE;
00713 
00714         LASSERT (i < nkiov);
00715 
00716         pid = (lnet_process_id_packed_t *)page_address(kiov[i].kiov_page);
00717 
00718         return &pid[idx % SFW_ID_PER_PAGE];
00719 }
00720 
00721 static int
00722 lstcon_dstnodes_prep(lstcon_group_t *grp, int idx,
00723                      int dist, int span, int nkiov, lnet_kiov_t *kiov)
00724 {
00725         lnet_process_id_packed_t *pid;
00726         lstcon_ndlink_t          *ndl;
00727         lstcon_node_t            *nd;
00728         int                       start;
00729         int                       end;
00730         int                       i = 0;
00731 
00732         LASSERT (dist >= 1);
00733         LASSERT (span >= 1);
00734         LASSERT (grp->grp_nnode >= 1);
00735 
00736         if (span > grp->grp_nnode)
00737                 return -EINVAL;
00738 
00739         start = ((idx / dist) * span) % grp->grp_nnode;
00740         end   = ((idx / dist) * span + span - 1) % grp->grp_nnode;
00741 
00742         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &grp->grp_ndl_list, ndl_link) {
00743                 nd = ndl->ndl_node;
00744                 if (i < start) {
00745                         i++;
00746                         continue;
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 if (i > (end >= start ? end : grp->grp_nnode))
00750                         break;
00751 
00752                 pid = lstcon_next_id((i - start), nkiov, kiov);
00753                 pid->nid = nd->nd_id.nid;
00754                 pid->pid = nd->nd_id.pid;
00755                 i++;
00756         }
00757 
00758         if (start <= end)       /* done */
00759                 return 0;
00760 
00761         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &grp->grp_ndl_list, ndl_link) {
00762                 if (i > grp->grp_nnode + end)
00763                         break;
00764 
00765                 nd = ndl->ndl_node;
00766                 pid = lstcon_next_id((i - start), nkiov, kiov);
00767                 pid->nid = nd->nd_id.nid;
00768                 pid->pid = nd->nd_id.pid;
00769                 i++;
00770         }
00771 
00772         return 0;
00773 }
00774 
00775 static int
00776 lstcon_pingrpc_prep(lst_test_ping_param_t *param, srpc_test_reqst_t *req)
00777 {
00778         test_ping_req_t *prq = &req->tsr_u.ping;
00779 
00780         prq->png_size   = param->png_size;
00781         prq->png_flags  = param->png_flags;
00782         /* TODO dest */
00783         return 0;
00784 }
00785 
00786 static int
00787 lstcon_bulkrpc_v0_prep(lst_test_bulk_param_t *param, srpc_test_reqst_t *req)
00788 {
00789         test_bulk_req_t *brq = &req->tsr_u.bulk_v0;
00790 
00791         brq->blk_opc    = param->blk_opc;
00792         brq->blk_npg    = (param->blk_size + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) /
00793                            PAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00794         brq->blk_flags  = param->blk_flags;
00795 
00796         return 0;
00797 }
00798 
00799 static int
00800 lstcon_bulkrpc_v1_prep(lst_test_bulk_param_t *param, srpc_test_reqst_t *req)
00801 {
00802         test_bulk_req_v1_t *brq = &req->tsr_u.bulk_v1;
00803 
00804         brq->blk_opc    = param->blk_opc;
00805         brq->blk_flags  = param->blk_flags;
00806         brq->blk_len    = param->blk_size;
00807         brq->blk_offset = 0; /* reserved */
00808 
00809         return 0;
00810 }
00811 
00812 int
00813 lstcon_testrpc_prep(lstcon_node_t *nd, int transop, unsigned feats,
00814                     lstcon_test_t *test, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc)
00815 {
00816         lstcon_group_t    *sgrp = test->tes_src_grp;
00817         lstcon_group_t    *dgrp = test->tes_dst_grp;
00818         srpc_test_reqst_t *trq;
00819         srpc_bulk_t       *bulk;
00820         int                i;
00821         int                npg = 0;
00822         int                nob = 0;
00823         int                rc  = 0;
00824 
00825         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD) {
00826                 npg = sfw_id_pages(test->tes_span);
00827                 nob = (feats & LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN) == 0 ?
00828                       npg * PAGE_CACHE_SIZE :
00829                       sizeof(lnet_process_id_packed_t) * test->tes_span;
00830         }
00831 
00832         rc = lstcon_rpc_prep(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_TEST, feats, npg, nob, crpc);
00833         if (rc != 0)
00834                 return rc;
00835 
00836         trq  = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.tes_reqst;
00837 
00838         if (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD) {
00839                 int ndist = (sgrp->grp_nnode + test->tes_dist - 1) / test->tes_dist;
00840                 int nspan = (dgrp->grp_nnode + test->tes_span - 1) / test->tes_span;
00841                 int nmax = (ndist + nspan - 1) / nspan;
00842 
00843                 trq->tsr_ndest = 0;
00844                 trq->tsr_loop  = nmax * test->tes_dist * test->tes_concur;
00845 
00846         } else {
00847                 bulk = &(*crpc)->crp_rpc->crpc_bulk;
00848 
00849                 for (i = 0; i < npg; i++) {
00850                         int     len;
00851 
00852                         LASSERT(nob > 0);
00853 
00854                         len = (feats & LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN) == 0 ?
00855                               PAGE_CACHE_SIZE : min_t(int, nob, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00856                         nob -= len;
00857 
00858                         bulk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_offset = 0;
00859                         bulk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_len    = len;
00860                         bulk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page   =
00861                                 alloc_page(GFP_KERNEL);
00862 
00863                         if (bulk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page == NULL) {
00864                                 lstcon_rpc_put(*crpc);
00865                                 return -ENOMEM;
00866                         }
00867                 }
00868 
00869                 bulk->bk_sink = 0;
00870 
00871                 LASSERT (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD);
00872 
00873                 rc = lstcon_dstnodes_prep(test->tes_dst_grp,
00874                                           test->tes_cliidx++,
00875                                           test->tes_dist,
00876                                           test->tes_span,
00877                                           npg, &bulk->bk_iovs[0]);
00878                 if (rc != 0) {
00879                         lstcon_rpc_put(*crpc);
00880                         return rc;
00881                 }
00882 
00883                 trq->tsr_ndest = test->tes_span;
00884                 trq->tsr_loop  = test->tes_loop;
00885         }
00886 
00887         trq->tsr_sid        = console_session.ses_id;
00888         trq->tsr_bid        = test->tes_hdr.tsb_id;
00889         trq->tsr_concur     = test->tes_concur;
00890         trq->tsr_is_client  = (transop == LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD) ? 1 : 0;
00891         trq->tsr_stop_onerr = !!test->tes_stop_onerr;
00892 
00893         switch (test->tes_type) {
00894         case LST_TEST_PING:
00895                 trq->tsr_service = SRPC_SERVICE_PING;
00896                 rc = lstcon_pingrpc_prep((lst_test_ping_param_t *)
00897                                          &test->tes_param[0], trq);
00898                 break;
00899 
00900         case LST_TEST_BULK:
00901                 trq->tsr_service = SRPC_SERVICE_BRW;
00902                 if ((feats & LST_FEAT_BULK_LEN) == 0) {
00903                         rc = lstcon_bulkrpc_v0_prep((lst_test_bulk_param_t *)
00904                                                     &test->tes_param[0], trq);
00905                 } else {
00906                         rc = lstcon_bulkrpc_v1_prep((lst_test_bulk_param_t *)
00907                                                     &test->tes_param[0], trq);
00908                 }
00909 
00910                 break;
00911         default:
00912                 LBUG();
00913                 break;
00914         }
00915 
00916         return rc;
00917 }
00918 
00919 static int
00920 lstcon_sesnew_stat_reply(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans,
00921                          lstcon_node_t *nd, srpc_msg_t *reply)
00922 {
00923         srpc_mksn_reply_t *mksn_rep = &reply->msg_body.mksn_reply;
00924         int                status   = mksn_rep->mksn_status;
00925 
00926         if (status == 0 &&
00927             (reply->msg_ses_feats & ~LST_FEATS_MASK) != 0) {
00928                 mksn_rep->mksn_status = EPROTO;
00929                 status = EPROTO;
00930         }
00931 
00932         if (status == EPROTO) {
00933                 CNETERR("session protocol error from %s: %u\n",
00934                         libcfs_nid2str(nd->nd_id.nid),
00935                         reply->msg_ses_feats);
00936         }
00937 
00938         if (status != 0)
00939                 return status;
00940 
00941         if (!trans->tas_feats_updated) {
00942                 spin_lock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00943                 if (!trans->tas_feats_updated) { /* recheck with lock */
00944                         trans->tas_feats_updated = 1;
00945                         trans->tas_features = reply->msg_ses_feats;
00946                 }
00947                 spin_unlock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
00948         }
00949 
00950         if (reply->msg_ses_feats != trans->tas_features) {
00951                 CNETERR("Framework features %x from %s is different with "
00952                         "features on this transaction: %x\n",
00953                          reply->msg_ses_feats, libcfs_nid2str(nd->nd_id.nid),
00954                          trans->tas_features);
00955                 status = mksn_rep->mksn_status = EPROTO;
00956         }
00957 
00958         if (status == 0) {
00959                 /* session timeout on remote node */
00960                 nd->nd_timeout = mksn_rep->mksn_timeout;
00961         }
00962 
00963         return status;
00964 }
00965 
00966 void
00967 lstcon_rpc_stat_reply(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, srpc_msg_t *msg,
00968                       lstcon_node_t *nd, lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat)
00969 {
00970         srpc_rmsn_reply_t  *rmsn_rep;
00971         srpc_debug_reply_t *dbg_rep;
00972         srpc_batch_reply_t *bat_rep;
00973         srpc_test_reply_t  *test_rep;
00974         srpc_stat_reply_t  *stat_rep;
00975         int                 rc = 0;
00976 
00977         switch (trans->tas_opc) {
00978         case LST_TRANS_SESNEW:
00979                 rc = lstcon_sesnew_stat_reply(trans, nd, msg);
00980                 if (rc == 0) {
00981                         lstcon_sesop_stat_success(stat, 1);
00982                         return;
00983                 }
00984 
00985                 lstcon_sesop_stat_failure(stat, 1);
00986                 break;
00987 
00988         case LST_TRANS_SESEND:
00989                 rmsn_rep = &msg->msg_body.rmsn_reply;
00990                 /* ESRCH is not an error for end session */
00991                 if (rmsn_rep->rmsn_status == 0 ||
00992                     rmsn_rep->rmsn_status == ESRCH) {
00993                         lstcon_sesop_stat_success(stat, 1);
00994                         return;
00995                 }
00996 
00997                 lstcon_sesop_stat_failure(stat, 1);
00998                 rc = rmsn_rep->rmsn_status;
00999                 break;
01000 
01001         case LST_TRANS_SESQRY:
01002         case LST_TRANS_SESPING:
01003                 dbg_rep = &msg->msg_body.dbg_reply;
01004 
01005                 if (dbg_rep->dbg_status == ESRCH) {
01006                         lstcon_sesqry_stat_unknown(stat, 1);
01007                         return;
01008                 }
01009 
01010                 if (lstcon_session_match(dbg_rep->dbg_sid))
01011                         lstcon_sesqry_stat_active(stat, 1);
01012                 else
01013                         lstcon_sesqry_stat_busy(stat, 1);
01014                 return;
01015 
01016         case LST_TRANS_TSBRUN:
01017         case LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP:
01018                 bat_rep = &msg->msg_body.bat_reply;
01019 
01020                 if (bat_rep->bar_status == 0) {
01021                         lstcon_tsbop_stat_success(stat, 1);
01022                         return;
01023                 }
01024 
01025                 if (bat_rep->bar_status == EPERM &&
01026                     trans->tas_opc == LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP) {
01027                         lstcon_tsbop_stat_success(stat, 1);
01028                         return;
01029                 }
01030 
01031                 lstcon_tsbop_stat_failure(stat, 1);
01032                 rc = bat_rep->bar_status;
01033                 break;
01034 
01035         case LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY:
01036         case LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY:
01037                 bat_rep = &msg->msg_body.bat_reply;
01038 
01039                 if (bat_rep->bar_active != 0)
01040                         lstcon_tsbqry_stat_run(stat, 1);
01041                 else
01042                         lstcon_tsbqry_stat_idle(stat, 1);
01043 
01044                 if (bat_rep->bar_status == 0)
01045                         return;
01046 
01047                 lstcon_tsbqry_stat_failure(stat, 1);
01048                 rc = bat_rep->bar_status;
01049                 break;
01050 
01051         case LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD:
01052         case LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD:
01053                 test_rep = &msg->msg_body.tes_reply;
01054 
01055                 if (test_rep->tsr_status == 0) {
01056                         lstcon_tsbop_stat_success(stat, 1);
01057                         return;
01058                 }
01059 
01060                 lstcon_tsbop_stat_failure(stat, 1);
01061                 rc = test_rep->tsr_status;
01062                 break;
01063 
01064         case LST_TRANS_STATQRY:
01065                 stat_rep = &msg->msg_body.stat_reply;
01066 
01067                 if (stat_rep->str_status == 0) {
01068                         lstcon_statqry_stat_success(stat, 1);
01069                         return;
01070                 }
01071 
01072                 lstcon_statqry_stat_failure(stat, 1);
01073                 rc = stat_rep->str_status;
01074                 break;
01075 
01076         default:
01077                 LBUG();
01078         }
01079 
01080         if (stat->trs_fwk_errno == 0)
01081                 stat->trs_fwk_errno = rc;
01082 
01083         return;
01084 }
01085 
01086 int
01087 lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(struct list_head *ndlist,
01088                         struct list_head *translist, int transop,
01089                         void *arg, lstcon_rpc_cond_func_t condition,
01090                         lstcon_rpc_trans_t **transpp)
01091 {
01092         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01093         lstcon_ndlink_t    *ndl;
01094         lstcon_node_t      *nd;
01095         lstcon_rpc_t       *rpc;
01096         unsigned            feats;
01097         int                 rc;
01098 
01099         /* Creating session RPG for list of nodes */
01100 
01101         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_prep(translist, transop, &trans);
01102         if (rc != 0) {
01103                 CERROR("Can't create transaction %d: %d\n", transop, rc);
01104                 return rc;
01105         }
01106 
01107         feats = trans->tas_features;
01108         list_for_each_entry(ndl, ndlist, ndl_link) {
01109                 rc = condition == NULL ? 1 :
01110                      condition(transop, ndl->ndl_node, arg);
01111 
01112                 if (rc == 0)
01113                         continue;
01114 
01115                 if (rc < 0) {
01116                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Condition error while creating RPC "
01117                                       " for transaction %d: %d\n", transop, rc);
01118                         break;
01119                 }
01120 
01121                 nd = ndl->ndl_node;
01122 
01123                 switch (transop) {
01124                 case LST_TRANS_SESNEW:
01125                 case LST_TRANS_SESEND:
01126                         rc = lstcon_sesrpc_prep(nd, transop, feats, &rpc);
01127                         break;
01128                 case LST_TRANS_SESQRY:
01129                 case LST_TRANS_SESPING:
01130                         rc = lstcon_dbgrpc_prep(nd, feats, &rpc);
01131                         break;
01132                 case LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD:
01133                 case LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD:
01134                         rc = lstcon_testrpc_prep(nd, transop, feats,
01135                                                  (lstcon_test_t *)arg, &rpc);
01136                         break;
01137                 case LST_TRANS_TSBRUN:
01138                 case LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP:
01139                 case LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY:
01140                 case LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY:
01141                         rc = lstcon_batrpc_prep(nd, transop, feats,
01142                                                 (lstcon_tsb_hdr_t *)arg, &rpc);
01143                         break;
01144                 case LST_TRANS_STATQRY:
01145                         rc = lstcon_statrpc_prep(nd, feats, &rpc);
01146                         break;
01147                 default:
01148                         rc = -EINVAL;
01149                         break;
01150                 }
01151 
01152                 if (rc != 0) {
01153                         CERROR("Failed to create RPC for transaction %s: %d\n",
01154                                lstcon_rpc_trans_name(transop), rc);
01155                         break;
01156                 }
01157 
01158                 lstcon_rpc_trans_addreq(trans, rpc);
01159         }
01160 
01161         if (rc == 0) {
01162                 *transpp = trans;
01163                 return 0;
01164         }
01165 
01166         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(trans);
01167 
01168         return rc;
01169 }
01170 
01171 static void
01172 lstcon_rpc_pinger(void *arg)
01173 {
01174         stt_timer_t        *ptimer = (stt_timer_t *)arg;
01175         lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans;
01176         lstcon_rpc_t       *crpc;
01177         srpc_msg_t         *rep;
01178         srpc_debug_reqst_t *drq;
01179         lstcon_ndlink_t    *ndl;
01180         lstcon_node_t      *nd;
01181         time_t              intv;
01182         int                 count = 0;
01183         int                 rc;
01184 
01185         /* RPC pinger is a special case of transaction,
01186          * it's called by timer at 8 seconds interval.
01187          */
01188         mutex_lock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01189 
01190         if (console_session.ses_shutdown || console_session.ses_expired) {
01191                 mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01192                 return;
01193         }
01194 
01195         if (!console_session.ses_expired &&
01196             cfs_time_current_sec() - console_session.ses_laststamp >
01197             (time_t)console_session.ses_timeout)
01198                 console_session.ses_expired = 1;
01199 
01200         trans = console_session.ses_ping;
01201 
01202         LASSERT(trans != NULL);
01203 
01204         list_for_each_entry(ndl, &console_session.ses_ndl_list, ndl_link) {
01205                 nd = ndl->ndl_node;
01206 
01207                 if (console_session.ses_expired) {
01208                         /* idle console, end session on all nodes */
01209                         if (nd->nd_state != LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
01210                                 continue;
01211 
01212                         rc = lstcon_sesrpc_prep(nd, LST_TRANS_SESEND,
01213                                                 trans->tas_features, &crpc);
01214                         if (rc != 0) {
01215                                 CERROR("Out of memory\n");
01216                                 break;
01217                         }
01218 
01219                         lstcon_rpc_trans_addreq(trans, crpc);
01220                         lstcon_rpc_post(crpc);
01221 
01222                         continue;
01223                 }
01224 
01225                 crpc = &nd->nd_ping;
01226 
01227                 if (crpc->crp_rpc != NULL) {
01228                         LASSERT(crpc->crp_trans == trans);
01229                         LASSERT(!list_empty(&crpc->crp_link));
01230 
01231                         spin_lock(&crpc->crp_rpc->crpc_lock);
01232 
01233                         LASSERT(crpc->crp_posted);
01234 
01235                         if (!crpc->crp_finished) {
01236                                 /* in flight */
01237                                 spin_unlock(&crpc->crp_rpc->crpc_lock);
01238                                 continue;
01239                         }
01240 
01241                         spin_unlock(&crpc->crp_rpc->crpc_lock);
01242 
01243                         lstcon_rpc_get_reply(crpc, &rep);
01244 
01245                         list_del_init(&crpc->crp_link);
01246 
01247                         lstcon_rpc_put(crpc);
01248                 }
01249 
01250                 if (nd->nd_state != LST_NODE_ACTIVE)
01251                         continue;
01252 
01253                 intv = cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_sub(cfs_time_current(),
01254                                                      nd->nd_stamp));
01255                 if (intv < (time_t)nd->nd_timeout / 2)
01256                         continue;
01257 
01258                 rc = lstcon_rpc_init(nd, SRPC_SERVICE_DEBUG,
01259                                      trans->tas_features, 0, 0, 1, crpc);
01260                 if (rc != 0) {
01261                         CERROR("Out of memory\n");
01262                         break;
01263                 }
01264 
01265                 drq = &crpc->crp_rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.dbg_reqst;
01266 
01267                 drq->dbg_sid   = console_session.ses_id;
01268                 drq->dbg_flags = 0;
01269 
01270                 lstcon_rpc_trans_addreq(trans, crpc);
01271                 lstcon_rpc_post(crpc);
01272 
01273                 count++;
01274         }
01275 
01276         if (console_session.ses_expired) {
01277                 mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01278                 return;
01279         }
01280 
01281         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Ping %d nodes in session\n", count);
01282 
01283         ptimer->stt_expires = (cfs_time_t)(cfs_time_current_sec() + LST_PING_INTERVAL);
01284         stt_add_timer(ptimer);
01285 
01286         mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01287 }
01288 
01289 int
01290 lstcon_rpc_pinger_start(void)
01291 {
01292         stt_timer_t     *ptimer;
01293         int              rc;
01294 
01295         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_rpc_freelist));
01296         LASSERT(atomic_read(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter) == 0);
01297 
01298         rc = lstcon_rpc_trans_prep(NULL, LST_TRANS_SESPING,
01299                                    &console_session.ses_ping);
01300         if (rc != 0) {
01301                 CERROR("Failed to create console pinger\n");
01302                 return rc;
01303         }
01304 
01305         ptimer = &console_session.ses_ping_timer;
01306         ptimer->stt_expires = (cfs_time_t)(cfs_time_current_sec() + LST_PING_INTERVAL);
01307 
01308         stt_add_timer(ptimer);
01309 
01310         return 0;
01311 }
01312 
01313 void
01314 lstcon_rpc_pinger_stop(void)
01315 {
01316         LASSERT (console_session.ses_shutdown);
01317 
01318         stt_del_timer(&console_session.ses_ping_timer);
01319 
01320         lstcon_rpc_trans_abort(console_session.ses_ping, -ESHUTDOWN);
01321         lstcon_rpc_trans_stat(console_session.ses_ping, lstcon_trans_stat());
01322         lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(console_session.ses_ping);
01323 
01324         memset(lstcon_trans_stat(), 0, sizeof(lstcon_trans_stat_t));
01325 
01326         console_session.ses_ping = NULL;
01327 }
01328 
01329 void
01330 lstcon_rpc_cleanup_wait(void)
01331 {
01332         lstcon_rpc_trans_t      *trans;
01333         lstcon_rpc_t            *crpc;
01334         struct list_head        *pacer;
01335         struct list_head         zlist;
01336 
01337         /* Called with hold of global mutex */
01338 
01339         LASSERT(console_session.ses_shutdown);
01340 
01341         while (!list_empty(&console_session.ses_trans_list)) {
01342                 list_for_each(pacer, &console_session.ses_trans_list) {
01343                         trans = list_entry(pacer, lstcon_rpc_trans_t,
01344                                            tas_link);
01345 
01346                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Session closed, wakeup transaction %s\n",
01347                                lstcon_rpc_trans_name(trans->tas_opc));
01348 
01349                         wake_up(&trans->tas_waitq);
01350                 }
01351 
01352                 mutex_unlock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01353 
01354                 CWARN("Session is shutting down, "
01355                       "waiting for termination of transactions\n");
01356                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
01357                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1));
01358 
01359                 mutex_lock(&console_session.ses_mutex);
01360         }
01361 
01362         spin_lock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
01363 
01364         lst_wait_until((atomic_read(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter) == 0),
01365                        console_session.ses_rpc_lock,
01366                        "Network is not accessable or target is down, "
01367                        "waiting for %d console RPCs to being recycled\n",
01368                        atomic_read(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter));
01369 
01370         list_add(&zlist, &console_session.ses_rpc_freelist);
01371         list_del_init(&console_session.ses_rpc_freelist);
01372 
01373         spin_unlock(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
01374 
01375         while (!list_empty(&zlist)) {
01376                 crpc = list_entry(zlist.next, lstcon_rpc_t, crp_link);
01377 
01378                 list_del(&crpc->crp_link);
01379                 LIBCFS_FREE(crpc, sizeof(lstcon_rpc_t));
01380         }
01381 }
01382 
01383 int
01384 lstcon_rpc_module_init(void)
01385 {
01386         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_ping_timer.stt_list);
01387         console_session.ses_ping_timer.stt_func = lstcon_rpc_pinger;
01388         console_session.ses_ping_timer.stt_data = &console_session.ses_ping_timer;
01389 
01390         console_session.ses_ping = NULL;
01391 
01392         spin_lock_init(&console_session.ses_rpc_lock);
01393         atomic_set(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter, 0);
01394         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&console_session.ses_rpc_freelist);
01395 
01396         return 0;
01397 }
01398 
01399 void
01400 lstcon_rpc_module_fini(void)
01401 {
01402         LASSERT(list_empty(&console_session.ses_rpc_freelist));
01403         LASSERT(atomic_read(&console_session.ses_rpc_counter) == 0);
01404 }
